attributes.action: Apologise to everyone for not bowing his head yesterday at the Cenotaph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I watched and taped the Rememberance Service at London yesterday and I watched Gordon Brown place his wreath on the Cenotaph.  He stepped back and did not I repeat did not bow his head or even nod.  I have ran and re-ran the tape of this and he just has that blank expression on his face.  He thinks he is above everyone else on this earth, and doesn't care about whose feelings he upsets, he doesn't care about the Soldiers being killed in Afghanistan and other places where our soldiers are being sent to fight other peoples war.
He should hang his head in shame, the televison caught the expression on his face and it says it all.  If it had been in Henry V111 time then we should have said off with his head.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
